snippet.title: Frostpunk 2 | Accolades Trailer
snippet.description:
#Frostpunk 2 is out! Play now: http://re.11bits.com/x2b

Develop, expand, and advance your city in a society survival game set 30 years after an apocalyptic blizzard ravaged Earth. In Frostpunk 2, you face not only the perils of never-ending winter, but also the powerful factions that watch your every step inside the Council Hall.

Steward, the city needs you! Are you up for the challenge? #TheCityMustNotFall #Frostpunk2 

Listen to the game's OST by Piotr Musiał: https://soundtracks.lnk.to/frostpunk2

Follow Frostpunk on twitter/X: https://x.com/frostpunkgame
Join our discord: https://discord.com/invite/11bitstudios
